# [Interview #187: SciFi Weekly Interview, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=187#4)

#### Sci Fi Weekly

What is your favorite Lord of the Rings movie?

#### Robert Jordan

(Laughs.) If I have to pick a favorite, I will pick
*The Return of the King*
. We get the climax, the triumph of good and all of that.
